flawed_nl_solution:
Tom is 32+5=<<32+5=41>>41 years old
So 7 years ago he was 41-7=<<41-7=34>>34 years old
Half of his age was 34/2=<<34/2=17>>17 years old
So 7 years ago Jim was 17+5=22
So he is now 22+7=<<22+7=29>>29 years old
That means in 2 years he will be 29+2=<<29+2=31>>31 years old
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 37, not 41. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
